message.content:
I need to calculate the final depreciation value from the income statement based on the transaction data.

Looking at the data, I need to identify transactions related to depreciation. The standard format for recording depreciation is usually a transaction with the type "Depreciation".

In this data, I can see one depreciation transaction:

| id | type | date | recorded_date | amount | recorded_amount |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Depreciation20240101001 | Depreciation | 2024-01-01 | 2024-01-01 | 45748.43000000001 | 45748.43000000001 |

This is the only depreciation transaction in the provided dataset, and it has an amount of 45748.43000000001, which rounds to 45748.43.

Since there are no other depreciation entries, this represents the total depreciation amount that would appear in the income statement.

```json
{"solution": {'Depreciation': '45748.43'} }
```
